attributes.action: Introduce working chain gangs for all prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prison is not the preventative tool anymore. Criminals take it as a holiday. make them contribute towards the society they have wronged.
make them work 12 hours a day 7 days a week, or something similar on community projects like cleaning the streets. Or better still cleaning Hospitals, anything to help the public service. You could double the prison capacity by making work gangs for night and day. Anything similar, if you agree with the basic idea sign up, and at least make the politicians discuss it and take it further.
At least this way crime wont pay. or cost the public funds and it will definately act as a true deterant
